original_text: This happened on the thirteenth day of the month of Adar, and on the fourteenth they rested and made it a day of feasting and joy.
korean_text: 아달월 십삼일에 그 일을 행하였고 십사일에 쉬며 그 날에 잔치를 베풀어 즐겼고

sentences.original_text: This happened on the thirteenth day of the month of Adar
and on the fourteenth they rested
and made it a day of feasting and joy
